episodes.name: Danger Mouse Begins Again
episodes.overview: After a year of inactivity, Danger Mouse is called back into action to stop Baron Greenback from taking over the world.

episodes.name: Danger At C Level
episodes.overview: Baron Greenback's plan to flood London is put into action, and only Danger Mouse can stop him.

episodes.name: Greenfinger
episodes.overview: Baron Greenback uses his latest invention to take control of all the world's vegetation.

name: Season 1
overview: The first season of the rebooted Danger Mouse series.
